column1: # Name: Average hours spent on unpaid domestic work , Male

# Definition: Time spent in domestic work, male refers to average hours per day that men ages 20-74 spent on housework, child and adult care, gardening and pet care, construction and repairs, shopping and services, and household management
# Source: World Bank World DataBank Gender Statistics; Compiled from UNECE
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
